summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3717 , for the improvement of North 84th Street, from a connection with the existing sewer on Woodland Park Avenue to a point approximately 250 feet west of Aurora Avenue; by constructing sewers, under Ordinance No. 45677 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
